mentions.context: Audioset consists in 10-second audio clips extracted from youtube videos [3].
The task focuses on a subset of Audioset that focuses on 10 classes of sound events [2].
Task 4 corpus was derived from the Audioset corpus [3] targeting classes of sound events related to domestic applications.
The audio clips are selected such that the distribution per class of sound event (based on Audioset labels) is close to the distribution in the labeled set.
Labeled training set: contains 1,578 audio clips (2,244 class occurrences) for which weak labels provided in Audioset have been verified and corrected by human annotators.
Unlabeled out of domain training set: is composed of 39,999 audio clips extracted from classes of sound events that are not considered in the task (according to unverified Audioset labels).
